name: gate7-coffee-roastery
description: Gate 7 Coffee Roastery - Coffee As You Are

scripts.deploy:seo: npm run build:seo && git add dist -f && git commit -m "chore: production build with SEO validation" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:protect: npm run build:protect && git add dist -f && git commit -m "chore: production build with protection" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:force: npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -am "chore: production build (forced)" && git push origin master -f
